amendment.description: Amendment limits the use of funds in Title I for the Missouri River Recovery Program to $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the use of funds in Title I for the Missouri River Recovery Program to $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
